title: paramananda
sahitya:
paramAnanda bhakti tandaruL kandA prabhO



anupallavi



varai mAdu kanda maindanin pAdAravinda



caraNam



inbarODu vishvambari irukAl ariyum paNi sharabam paNi murugA enum nin
anbarOdu
shEndagham negizhndu urugavE tandu appanE kavi kunjaradAsanin Ararul paruga
ishai peruga
